languages.text: {n}Опешив, священник подается назад. Он открывает рот и... маленькая, едва заметная мушка влетает между его редких зубов, исчезая в глотке. Проповедник даже не заметил ее.{/n} "Что за еретические речи ты произносишь? Я... я верую! С чего мне бояться гибели?"

{n}The priest staggers back, stunned. He opens his mouth... and a tiny, barely visible fly passes between his gapped teeth and disappears in his throat. The preacher does not even notice.{/n} "What is all this heretical talk? I— I do believe! Why would I be afraid of death?"
languages.original_text: {n}Опешив, священник подается назад. Он открывает рот и... маленькая, едва заметная мушка влетает между его редких зубов, исчезая в глотке. Проповедник даже не заметил ее.{/n} "Что за еретические речи ты произносишь? Я... я верую! С чего мне бояться гибели?"

traits.locale_text: {n}The priest staggers back, stunned. He opens his mouth... and a tiny, barely visible fly passes between his gapped teeth and disappears in his throat. The preacher never even noticed it.{/n} "What is all this heretical talk? I— I do believe! Why would I be afraid of death?"
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: {n}牧师踉跄地后退着，目瞪口呆。他张开嘴……一只几乎看不到的小苍蝇从他的牙齿隙间飞过，消失在他的喉咙里，但他完全没注意到这件事情。{/n}“这些异端言论到底是怎么回事？我——我信仰帝皇！我怎么么会惧怕死亡？”
languages.original_text: {n}The priest staggers back, stunned. He opens his mouth... and a tiny, barely visible fly passes between his gapped teeth and disappears in his throat. The preacher does not even notice.{/n} "What is all this heretical talk? I— I do believe! Why would I be afraid of death?"

traits.locale_text: {n}牧师踉跄地后退着，目瞪口呆。他张开嘴……一只几乎看不到的小苍蝇从他的牙齿隙间飞过，消失在他的喉咙里，但他完全没注意到这件事情。{/n}“这些异端言论到底是怎么回事？我——我信仰帝皇！我怎么么会惧怕死亡？”
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: {n}祭司はよろめき、呆然としている。彼が口を開けば、目に見えないほど小さなハエが彼の歯の隙間を飛んで口から喉の中へと入っていく。彼はそんな事にも気が付いていないようだ。{/n}「この異端論は何だ？し、信じられない！何故この私が、死を恐れると言うのだ？」
languages.original_text: {n}The priest staggers back, stunned. He opens his mouth... and a tiny, barely visible fly passes between his gapped teeth and disappears in his throat. The preacher does not even notice.{/n} "What is all this heretical talk? I— I do believe! Why would I be afraid of death?"

traits.locale_text: {n}祭司はよろめき、呆然としている。彼が口を開けば、目に見えないほど小さなハエが彼の歯の隙間を飛んで口から喉の中へと入っていく。彼はそんな事にも気が付いていないようだ。{/n}「この異端論は何だ？し、信じられない！何故この私が、死を恐れると言うのだ？」
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: {n}El sacerdote se tambalea hacia atrás, aturdido. Abre la boca y una mosca diminuta, apenas visible, pasa entre sus dientes y desaparece en su garganta. El predicador ni siquiera se ha dado cuenta.{/n} «¿Qué es toda esta charla herética? Yo... ¡yo creo! ¿Por qué habría de temerle a la muerte?».
languages.original_text: {n}The priest staggers back, stunned. He opens his mouth... and a tiny, barely visible fly passes between his gapped teeth and disappears in his throat. The preacher does not even notice.{/n} "What is all this heretical talk? I— I do believe! Why would I be afraid of death?"

traits.locale_text: {n}El sacerdote se tambalea hacia atrás, aturdido. Abre la boca y una mosca diminuta, apenas visible, pasa entre sus dientes y desaparece en su garganta. El predicador ni siquiera se ha dado cuenta.{/n} «¿Qué es toda esta charla herética? Yo... ¡yo creo! ¿Por qué habría de temerle a la muerte?».
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: {n}Der Priester taumelt schockiert zurück. Er öffnet den Mund ... und eine einzige, kaum sichtbare Fliege fliegt zwischen seinen Zähnen hindurch und verschwindet in seinem Rachen. Der Prediger bemerkt es nicht einmal.{/n} "Was soll das ketzerische Gerede? Ich ... ich glaube! Warum sollte ich den Tod fürchten?"
languages.original_text: {n}The priest staggers back, stunned. He opens his mouth... and a tiny, barely visible fly passes between his gapped teeth and disappears in his throat. The preacher does not even notice.{/n} "What is all this heretical talk? I— I do believe! Why would I be afraid of death?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Priester taumelt schockiert zurück. Er öffnet den Mund ... und eine einzige, kaum sichtbare Fliege fliegt zwischen seinen Zähnen hindurch und verschwindet in seinem Rachen. Der Prediger hat sie nicht einmal bemerkt.{/n} "Was soll das ketzerische Gerede? Ich ... ich glaube! Warum sollte ich den Tod fürchten?"
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: {n}Le prêtre fait un pas en arrière comme si vous l'aviez frappé. Il ouvre la bouche... et une minuscule mouche se glisse entre ses mâchoires entrouvertes avant de disparaître dans sa gorge, mais il ne semble même pas le remarquer.{/n} « Quelle est cette hérésie ? Je... J'ai la foi ! Pourquoi aurais-je peur de la mort ? »
languages.original_text: {n}The priest staggers back, stunned. He opens his mouth... and a tiny, barely visible fly passes between his gapped teeth and disappears in his throat. The preacher does not even notice.{/n} "What is all this heretical talk? I— I do believe! Why would I be afraid of death?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Le prêtre fait un pas en arrière comme si vous l'aviez frappé. Il ouvre la bouche... et une minuscule petite mouche se glisse entre ses mâchoires entrouvertes avant de disparaître dans sa gorge, mais il ne semble même pas le remarquer.{/n} « Quelle est cette hérésie ? Je... J'ai la foi ! Pourquoi aurais-je peur de la mort ? »
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: {n}Rahip, afallayarak geriye doğru sendeliyor. Ağzını açıyor ve... Küçük, zar zor görülebilen bir sinek, gedikli dişlerinin arasından uçup boğazında kayboluyor. O ise bunu fark etmiyor bile.{/n} "Söylediğin bu kâfirce şeyler de ne demek oluyor? Ben... Ben inanıyorum! Neden ölümden korkacakmışım?"
languages.original_text: {n}The priest staggers back, stunned. He opens his mouth... and a tiny, barely visible fly passes between his gapped teeth and disappears in his throat. The preacher does not even notice.{/n} "What is all this heretical talk? I— I do believe! Why would I be afraid of death?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Rahip afallayarak geriye doğru sendeliyor. Ağzını açıyor ve... Küçük, zar zor görülebilen bir sinek, gedikli dişlerinin arasından uçuyor ve boğazında kayboluyor. Vaiz bunu fark etmiyor bile.{/n} "Söylediğin bu kâfirce şeyler de ne demek? Ben... Ben inanıyorum! Neden ölümden korkacakmışım?"
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04
